description:
The Shediac Denim Shirt pays tribute to the finer things about New Brunswick: its people, its rivers, its hospitality, its fishing community and not so surprisingly, its delicious lobster!

Made from 100% organic cotton, our denim shirt is comfortable and soft, perfect for those cooler evenings on vacation in Shediac. Inspired by this seaside town along New Brunswick's east coast, our embroidered illustration designed by Dan Sheridan lives up to the world's largest representation of a lobster!

One of our favorite places to fish in Canada, New Brunswick is a paradise for fly fishermen of all kinds. The Shediac denim shirt will definitely be part of our next expedition on the abundant rivers of New Brunswick. With two flap pockets on the chest with snap closure and a hidden accessory loop for attaching tools, it is practical and versatile
name: Hooke Fishing Lobster Denim Shirt - Mens
